pageContent: Purpose of review: This review discusses the feasibility, recent advances and current status of in-bore MRI-guided interventional techniques for diagnosis and treatment of focal prostate cancer (PCa) and also explores the future applications, highlighting the emerging strategies for the treatment of PCa.

metaData.source:
Oncological and functional outcome after partial prostate HIFU ablation with Focal-One®: a prospective single-center study
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/34007021/
